name: Outer Mind Vertical Slice
description:
Outer Mind is a fast-paced spaceship simulation game where you are in competition with other players to get the best score! How far will you be able to travel while avoiding asteroids that are being hurled towards your spaceship? 

The main objective is to travel as far as you can without getting hit by an asteroid. Using the keyboard and mouse as tools for controlling your very own spaceship, you get to decide the fate of the player who is alone on this journey through the universe.
